Random Events & Custom Random Encounter Table
Event Based Encounters
Plus over 30 other customizable forms for D20 and OGL adventure and campaigns

113122.name: Full Moon
113122.description:
The fullest moon, a rabbit with desires, can you bring satisfaction? Explore, point, click, drag, drop!

Source: The Developer Website.

113123.name: Superline: Campaign Planner 2
113123.description:
From publisher blurb:

This 46-page PDF continues where the Superline: Campaign Planner left off. With the forms in this PDF you can:

Plan an alien invasion -- and record details on the invaders!

Zoom in on a city district or neighborhood.

Roll a random patrol result -- after consulting the players' patrol schedule form to determine exactly where they usually are at any time.

And more!

Also includes the complete Crisis Level rules (originally appeared in Green Ronin Publishing's Crooks! supplement, used with permission).

113124.name: Ghost Recon 2: Summit Strike
113124.description:
User Summary

A follow-up release to Ghost Recon 2, Summit Strike was a standalone game that featured a new campaign and several new multiplayer maps and modes.

113125.name: Template: Biological Intruder
113125.description:
From Introduction:

Mutated viruses capable of transforming any unfortunate enough to be infected into utterly inhuman-and often monstrous-entities; clouds of alien spores, possessing a weird form of collective intelligence, that seek out suitable hosts as means of reproduction; nanites-self-replicating robots on the molecular scale-programmed to commandeer the DNA of organic life forms; all of these are examples of biological intruders. Biological intruders are malignant microorganisms that infect and seize control of another creature, multiplying inside the host body until the infected being’s biological processes are completely replaced by that of the biological intruder. Unlike most other templates, a character who becomes host to a biological intruder is less changed than infected; unlike symbiotic organisms, which adapt to functioning with the host’s body, biological intruders are deadly opportunistic organisms, using other living beings only as means of maturing or reproducing, and effectively slaying them in the process. A biological intruder that is allowed to progress to its’ final stages ravages the character’s physical and mental faculties, eventually destroying the host’s mind and vital functions and replacing them with its’ own.

113126.name: Template: Comic Force Infused
113126.description:
From Introduction:

The chosen agents of ancient alien races, mythological gods, or nigh-omnipotent cosmic entities; mighty champions gone wrong who -literally, in some cases sacrificed their souls to obtain still greater powers; mortal heroes transformed by contact with irresistible, unearthly energies that should have utterly annihilated them. All of these have been touched by cosmic forces, their already superhuman abilities augmented still further by energies beyond human understanding. Some such individuals may have been driven to wrest control of such titanic forces because of desperate needs or burning obsessions. Others seem to have been selected by fate, seemingly at random, to receive abilities that set them apart even from their superhuman peers. Regardless, all have emerged from their encounter with cosmic forces as something…more. Even those who began as demigods, immortals, or extra-dimensional sorcerers have evolved past their former states.

113127.name: Template: Demonic Possession
113127.description:
From Introduction:

Skeptics write off demonic possession as a convenient scapegoat for the deranged and criminally inclined. Unfortunately, however, it is all too often real, irrefutable and terrible in its otherworldly candor. The exact effects of possession vary with the demonic entity involved, but common traits include enhanced physical strength and endurance, near-immortality, and extreme psychosis. Though demons prefer to bond with weak-willed or greedy mortals, nearly anyone may become the vessel for a demonic spirit. A drifter, having stumbled upon an ancient and arcane artifact housing a powerful infernal entity. An occultist, after a spectacular conjuring failure. A dying man, who foolishly bargained with a powerful demon prince for more time. The infernal power housed within a victim is not always immediately obvious. But once the demon within is awakened, its dark persona drawn to the fore, there can be no mistake. Clearly, a potent, sinister force has been loosed on the world.

113128.name: Template: Energy Infused
113128.description:
From Introduction:

Atomic strongmen, whose nuclear-powered muscles are capable of crushing tanks; super-speedsters, who move at nearly at the speed of thought, trailing streams of bio-electricity in their wakes; walking powder kegs whose fists strike with the force of a one kiloton bomb. All are examples of energy-infused characters: Human-or superhuman-individuals somehow bonded with some form of energy, their cells now burning with unnatural power, their muscles and nerves crackling with inhuman vigor.

113129.name: Template: Molmech
113129.description:
From Introduction:

Blood streams teeming with nanites- microscopic machines that repair all wounds, cell by cell. Nervous systems modified to transmit impulses with the speed of a fiber-optics network. Living tissue interwoven with impact resistant polymers, made far stronger and more durable than mere human flesh. These are the characteristics of molmechs; organic beings (usually humans or superhumans) integrated with technology through means both more subtle and more fundamental than crude bionic limb grafts or sensor implants. The term “molmech” stands for molecular-machine, and as the name implies, this manmachine fusion extends all the way down to the molecular level. Sophisticated cybernetic systems control metabolism,, nervous system responses, even the formation of new tissues. Molmechs are also sometimes known as Cy-Breeds, or Techno-Organics.

113130.name: Template: Psychic Entity
113130.description:
From Introduction:

A living nightmare is delivering brutal justice to the old enemies of a once mighty super-hero, one who is now seemingly comatose and helpless. Imaginary friends that are all too real, protecting a child who witnessed her parents killed in a tragic accident. A horrible, unseen wraith that jumps from one body to the next, leaving a trail of carnage in it’s’ wake. All of these are psychic entities, born from a mix of psychic power, repressed desires, and blind chance. They reflect the best and worst traits of those whose minds they spring from. They may not truly exist; the power and danger they represent most assuredly does.

113131.name: Duck: Think Outside the Flock
113131.description:
Duck, think outside the flock, 25 levels for you to crack while you quack! A puzzle game featuring rubber ducks.

Source: The Publisher Website.

113132.name: The Manx TT Race Game
113132.description:
The Isle of Man TT races are held every year. The TT stands for Tourist Trophy. Bikers get to ride very fast around the lanes and roads on the island.

This game relates to their popularity. It is a relatively simple dice and move game, with certain spaces around the track giving instructions if you land on them. In addition, if two pieces end up on the same space, they are said to have crashed and must miss a turn. Also, if you roll too high a number when going round certain bends, you crash and must miss a turn.

First to the finish line, wins. If you want a longer game you can play on for whatever number of laps you choose.

113133.name: 1955 Local Mercenary Promo Card
113133.description: This expansion/promotion was a reward for the original Kickstarter supporters of 1955. It consists in two identical cards that can be added to the deck. A player may use this card to add three to his influence in the country in which his spy is located.

113134.description: This expansion/promotion for 1955 was given to the original Kickstarter supporter of the game (as well as attendees of game conventions). In consists in two College Activist cards that can be added to the game deck. One blue version helps influence the red countries, and one red version helps influence the blue countries. For each card the player reveals and discards from their hand, they gain one influence in that country.
113134.name: 1955: College Activist Promo Cards

113135.name: PixelJunk SideScroller
113135.description:
Q-Games goes old-school with a completely retro side-scrolling shooter. Reinventing the genre from the ground up while maintaining that nostalgic feeling, PixelJunk SideScroller is a bit of "side story" fun from the developers of PixelJunk Shooter. Dodge flurries of alien bullets and strategically upgrade your weapons as you battle your way through sweeping stages full of hazardous fluid and endless shooting mayhem. PixelJunk SideScroller is not just the same old-school side-scrolling shooter!

Source: The Developer Website.

113136.name: Nightmessenger (Vol 8 No 3 - Fall 2044)
113136.description:
User Summary

In this issue: Opening Fire, NOVA Works, The World "Out There," 10 O'clock News, Convention Reports, Nuts & Bolts, Murphy's Rules of Combat, 2044 Vehicle Guide Update, Duelslang, Quotes, The Showroom, Cube Logs, & Closing Fire.

113137.name: Nightmessenger (Vol 8 No 4 - Winter 2044)
113137.description:
User Summary

In this issue: Opening Fire, NOVA Works, The World "Out There," 10 O'clock News, Movie Releases, Convention Calendar, Nuts & Bolts, Revised Tank Ammunition, The Morning After The Night of the Return of The Living OOPS!!, Duelling Ideas, 2045 NOVA Club Duelling Championship, 2044 Vehicle Guide Update, Duelslang, Quotes, The Showroom, Winners and Losers of the Second Japanese-American War, Cube Logs, Editorial, & Closing Fire.

113138.name: Nightmessenger (Vol 9 No 1 - Spring 2045)
113138.description:
User Summary

In this issue: Opening Fire, NOVA Works, The World "Out There," 10 O'clock News, Movie Releases, Convention Calendar, Nuts & Bolts, Murphy's Corner, Classifieds, 2045 Midwest Duel Circuit - Round 1, Return Fire, 2045 NOVA Club Racing Championship, 2045 Midwest Regional Dueling Championship, Quotes, The Showroom, Cube Logs, & Closing Fire.

113139.name: Me and the Key
113139.description:
User Summary

'Me and the Key' is a Flash action puzzle game developed by Bart Bonte. Each level hides a key. Find it to move on to the next level.

113140.name: Me and the Key 2
113140.description:
User Summary

Second game in the series 'Me and the Key'. In each level you have find a key to go to the next level. The game combines puzzles and action.

113141.name: Shadowgun
113141.description:
Authored with the Unity development platform, SHADOWGUN combines tactical combat with third person harrowing action, ushering in a new visual standard for handheld gaming. SHADOWGUN puts players into the role of John Slade, a professional bounty hunter in the year 2350. Slade’s mission: hunt down Dr. Edgar Simon, renowned geneticist and former employee of the trans-galactic corporation Toltech Enterprises. Players must lead “shadowgun” John Slade as he infiltrates Dr. Simon’s mountain fortress and fights his personal army of mutants, cyborgs, and genetically-enhanced humanoids. Using state-of-the-art weaponry, ships, and the assistance of S.A.R.A.—Slade’s personal android assistant.

Source: The Developer Website.

113142.name: Please Stay Calm
113142.description:
User Summary

Join other survivors of the zombie apocalypse in reclaiming your home turf from the undead. Using a location based system, Please Stay Calm allows players to search nearby locations for supplies and money.

113143.name: Greedy Spiders
113143.description:
User Summary

Flies are caught in a web and are in need of some help. Remove strands one by one to keep the spider from his dinner.

113145.description:
As the Empire stood and witnessed the surprise assault on their beloved Galactus Prime, they plotted revenge. Now, they're rebuilding and retaliating in full force! The first expansion for Tom Decker's Assault on Galactus Prime, The Empire Shoots Back, broadens your options and promotes wilder gameplay in this deck-building, push-your-luck game. Now it's time for you to fight back before it's too late!

Note, the Assault on Galactus Prime Expansion Kit 1: The Empire Shoots Back is not a ‘stand alone’ game. You must own a copy of Assault on Galactus Prime to use this expansion kit.

Game Data:

Complexity: 3 on a 9 scale
Solitaire Suitability: 1 on a 9 scale
Scale: Each unit is a pilot or an assault craft battling at the capital of Galactus Prime.

Game Components:

• One 2-page full color Rules booklet
• 40 units and markers
• 20 Deck cards
• One Pilot Worlds mat extension
113145.name: Assault on Galactus Prime Expansion Kit 1: The Empire Shoots Back

113146.name: Jimmy White's 2: Cueball
113146.description:
Jimmy White's 2: Cueball is a sports simulation video game published by Virgin Interactive as a sequel to Jimmy White's Whirlwind Snooker. The development team was led by Archer MacLean, the designer of the original game. Cueball is a highly realistic snooker and pool (pocket billiards) simulator.

Source: Wikipedia, "Jimmy White's 2: Cueball", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

113147.name: ZeN
113147.description: ZeN is a connection game played on a torus, which can be visualized as a board whose edges "wrap" around to the opposite side. As in Quax, players alternate between either placing a stone of their color or connecting two of their stones diagonally. One player attempts to create either a vertical "loop" or a NW-SE "spiral" around the board, while the other aims for a horizontal "loop" or a SW-NE "spiral". Like in many connection games, draws are impossible and exactly one player must win.

113148.name: Ni Hao, Kai Lan: Super Game Day
113148.description:
Get ready to play with Kai-lan and friends in all sorts of super exciting games! You'll get to race to the finish line in a dragon boat, pop colorful bubbles, even catch sun fuzzies! Plus, you an practice your soccer skills, throw water balloons, and so much more to make your heart feel super happy! Let's go, go, go play some games!

Source: The Publisher Website.

113149.name: Super Stacker 2
113149.description:
User Summary

Stack the blocks in the order they are presented to you. If your stack remains stable the blocks smile and you move on to the next level. If your stack collapses you try again.

113150.name: Unblock Me
113150.description:
User Summary

Slide the brown blocks of wood to free up the red block so it can slide out the opening on the right.

113151.name: Shanghai Mahjong
113151.description:
Game Instructions

Mahjong Solitaire is a game of strategy, memory, and luck. The standard game begins with 144 tiles, arranged in one of many different layouts. The object is to remove all the tiles from the layout one pair at a time.

113152.name: Strategery
113152.description:
User Summary

Game is played on a randomly generated "board" of colored hexagons. Each hexagon represents a country. As countries of one color attack adjacent countries of another the outcome is determined by random dice rolls for each army in a given country. Game continues until one color controls the world.

113153.name: Strongholds: New Age
113153.description:
User Summary

Destroy your enemy's stronghold before he destroys yours using strategic card play. Cards can alter your resources, build your defenses or attack your opponent's stronghold.

113155.name: Sumo!

videogamehonor.39368: 2006 Swedish Game Awards Best Innovation Winner

113155.description:
Defeat the opposing sumo wrestler ("Rikishi") by knocking him off the bridge ("dohyo", fighting space). You can also win by being furthest advanced on the dohyo when the last tile is drawn. There's a deck of numbered tiles, like playing cards. Each player has five tiles in their hand. Players alternate playing tiles to move or attack until a Rikishi is knocked off the dohyo or the draw pile is exhausted. You can attack with multiple tiles to increase the intensity of the attck.

Source: The Developer Website.

113156.name: Oliver & Co.
113156.description:
Objective: find Jenny - caught and hidden by Bill Sykes - and be the first leading her home
- simple 'Roll and Move' game, moving by turn -
1. find Jenny entering houses and flipping cards
2. announce if you found her
3. bring her home (house in Park Avenue)
4. avoid to be caught by players (loose a card)
5. avoid to meet Bill Sykes (drop a card)
5. don't eat too many hot dogs (forced by cards)

113157.name: Mit dem Euro unterwegs
113157.description:
Objective: be the first to pass finish line (and learn more about the Euro-currency countries)
- 'Roll, Move, draw card, answer question & do what's requested' game -
game leads you through the 12 EC-countries with Euro currency
in a given order
Dice ==> moving through all the countries, drawing cards, answering questions, confronted by barriers ...

113158.name: Custom Characters
113158.description:
From the Publisher's Website:

A Guide to Free-Form Character Creation and Advancement

Description: Custom Characters revolutionizes the way you create and advance your characters for all fantasy roleplaying campaigns based on the OGL System Reference Document. Experience points are used as currency to buy all character traits resulting in a "classless" system. Unlike other attempts at a point buy system, Custom Characters bases trait costs on your character's level, not the trait level. This results in experience point progressions that closely mirror those found in class-based OGL fantasy games.

Custom Characters contains:


Rules for Character Generation and Advancement


In Custom Characters, players use XP like currency to buy their characters' traits. Starting with an initial allotment of XP, players build their starting characters to the exact specifications they desire. As players earn XP during play, new traits can be bought when desired (and, of course, when the GM allows!). Players don't have to wait for "level breaks" to see improvement in their characters' abilities. And the best thing is that the character building system in Custom Characters is much simpler than previously offered fare. All trait costs are calculated by multiplying the base cost for a trait by the character's level. Easy!


Over 300 Special Abilities


Class special abilities for all of the basic and prestige classes found in the SRD are detailed, allowing you to pick and choose exactly what abilities you want your character to possess. Logical prerequisites are listed for each class special ability. Rules are included on how to bring new class special abilities found in other rulebooks into the Custom Characters system.


Seven New Generic Character Classes


Expanding upon the generic classes found in the SRD, seven new character classes are built from the ground up. The combatant, the expert, the spellcaster, the specialist, the gish, the zerth, and the polymath are detailed and used to illustrate how creative gamemasters can apply the principles of Custom Characters to create unique character classes for their campaigns.


Spontaneous, Free-Form Magic System


Many game supplements have attempted to introduce a spontaneous spellcasting system for OGL-based games, with varying success. Most systems of "spell-building" are extremely complicated and require an inordinate amount of bookkeeping. Custom Characters contains an extremely simple system for spontaneous spellcasting that can be easily dropped into any campaign that requires no bookkeeping on the part of the players or gamemaster.


Two Alternate Experience Point Award Systems


Custom Characters offers two new ways to award experience points. The first is a simplified award system that continues to advance characters one "level equivalent" for every 13 or 14 evenly-matched encounters. The second system awards experience for characters who take long amounts of time off between adventures. This "blue-booking" system allows characters to continue to improve their abilities over time, even if adventures are separated by weeks, months, or years.


Level-by-Level Breakdowns of the Eleven Basic Character Classes


No free-form character building system is worth its salt if can't build the normal character classes accurately. Custom Characters provides a level-by-level analysis of the experience points required to advance characters along a single class. Experience point totals falling within the proper range for each level occur 85.5% of the time and are never more than one level away in any case. In this respect, Custom Characters is the most accurate "point buy" character building system for OGL-based games on the market.


Conclusion


Emphasizing simplicity and a minimum of bookkeeping, Custom Characters is an easy, rules-lite way to introduce a free-form, point-buy character building system into your OGL-based fantasy campaign.

113159.name: Was lebt da in der Stadt?
113159.description:
Objective: be the first to find all requested (cards) stuff (animals & plants) - learn more about your surrounding enviroment
roll the die, move around the board, draw cards fulfilling/finding the things on your to-do-list
proper method to learn, that there are more animals like cats, dogs, doves ... nice images

1 board
1 rules
4 meeples
1 die
5 replacement cards
6 'disorder' cards
40 animal cards

113160.name: Hoppla Hexenbrücke
113160.description:
Objective: be the first to move all of your 4 meeples home
- simple 'Roll & Move' game, similar to Pachisi -
- moving by turn -
the game differs from Pachisi that the circle you are moving on is bridged (4x2 holes); if your die shows only small numbers or you choose the wrong meeple - it is going to fall into the river

113161.name: Basic d20
113161.description:
From the Introduction:

Basic d20 is a simplified version of the d20 system suitable for use in any d20-based campaign. This system has been designed for quick character generation and ease of play. The focus is to make it simpler for players. The GM, however, must be well-versed in the d20 system to make use of this set of rules. Of course, all d20 resources can be used with this set of rules, without conversion.

113162.name: Basic d20 to D&D
113162.description:
From the Introduction:

Basic d20 is a simplified version of the d20 system suitable for use in any d20-based campaign. This system has been designed for quick character generation and ease of play. The focus is to make it simpler for players. The GM, however, must be well-versed in the d20 system to make use of this set of rules. The system cannot be used with older forms of Dungeons & Dragons without conversion, however. This document explains how to convert your Basic d20 character for use in older D&D modules and adventures.

113163.name: Basic d20 Force Skills
113163.description:
From the Publisher's Website:

This document details four new broad skill areas for Star Wars campaigns.

113164.name: Basic d20 to Chaosium BRP
113164.description:
From the Introduction:

Basic d20 is a simplified version of the d20 system suitable for use in any d20-based campaign. This system has been designed for quick character generation and ease of play. The focus is to make it simpler for players. The GM, however, must be well-versed in the d20 system to make use of this set of rules. The system cannot be used with other gaming systems without conversion, however. This document explains how to convert your Basic d20 character for use in Chaosium's Basic RolePlaying Game modules and adventures.

113165.name: Basic d20 Natural Advancement
113165.description:
From the Introduction:

Basic d20 is a simplified version of the d20 system suitable for use in any d20-based campaign. This system has been designed for quick character generation and ease of play. The focus is to make it simpler for players. The GM, however, must be well-versed in the d20 system to make use of this set of rules. The normal Basic d20 system uses the concept of Power Points from Mutants & Masterminds for player character advancement. This document details a simple, alternate advancement system for characters.

113166.name: Basic d20 Fantasy Races
113166.description:
From the Introduction:

If Basic d20 is used for a normal d20 fantasy campaign, some guidance is needed on how to handle ability score bonuses and penalties, racial skill bonuses, bonus racial skill points, bonus racial feats, racial languages, and other racial traits.

113167.name: Basic d20 Magic Skills
113167.description:
From the Introduction:

Basic d20 assumes that you will use the normal D&D spellcasting system to create characters. A more basic, generic system is detailed here that allows each character to be customized as the player desires. Old class distinctions are discarded in favor of a unified approach to spellcasting.

113168.name: Basic d20 Psionic Skills
113168.description:
From the Introduction:

Basic d20 assumes that you will use the normal D&D manifesting system to create psionic characters. A more basic, generic system is detailed here that allows each character to be customized as the player desires.

113169.name: Basic d20 Alignment
113169.description:
From the Introduction:

The alignment system in d20 games is difficult to use because there are no definite game rules covering alignment. Vital to any alignment system are rules to govern alignment shifts. Normally, it is left to the DM to decide if a player portrays his character's alignment correctly. If the player's roleplaying is found lacking, then the DM must use his own judgment, and the few guidelines given in the rulebooks, to decide if an alignment shift is appropriate. There are no game mechanics to fall back on.

In this system, both the ethical (law-chaos) and moral (good-evil) components of alignment are given a score on a scale of 0 to 20. The number 10 represents neutrality on both axes. Scores of 20 indicate a maximum of law and good, while scores of 0 indicate a maximum of chaos and evil. Thus, a thoroughly chaotic good character would have an ethics score of 0 and a morality score of 20. Conversely, a diabolically lawful evil character would have a 20 in ethics and a 0 in morality.

113170.name: Basic d20 Rules Checklist
113170.description:
From the Introduction:

It is quite obvious that Basic d20 is simply a modified version of Mutants & Masterminds that uses various optional rules from the Mastermind's Manual. This document spells out exactly what rules are used and gives an explanation of each. Page numbers in the Mastermind's Manual are given in parenthesis.

113171.name: Basic d20 Spellcasting
113171.description:
From the Introduction:

Basic d20 assumes that you will use the normal D&D spellcasting system to create characters. Characters will have a number of class-based spellcasting systems to choose from, such as cleric, druid, and wizard. A previous document, Basic d20 Magic Skills, detailed how each school of magic could be made into its own skill, thus eliminating class-based spellcasting entirely. Basic d20 Spellcasting offers an even simpler system: spellcasting based on the generic spellcaster from the SRD.

113172.name: Eisbär Flocke  Mein erstes Abenteuer
113172.description:
Objective; move Flocke, the little ice bear, onto your side reaching one of the marked corners
- 'Roll and Move' game, 2 players or teams, moving by turn -
each team receives 5 'action' cards;
icebear is placed into centre of the board, barriers elsewhere

roll the die and move the ice bear into direction of your (marked) base line or move bariers or split number and move both
only vertical or horizontal moves are allowed
a '6' gives you the possibility to fly with the bear (blue fields only)
an 'action' card may be added to the number, but must be discarded afterwards
fields marked with a feeding bottle - if bear lands on it - give you an additional turn

113173.name: Who Goes There?
113173.description: Party game. Each guest gets a card that informs them who they are for the evening. In addition, the card tells them which questions they might ask other guests about who they might be. All questions must be phrased so that the answer can only be "Yes" or "No". The winner is the guest who has the most correct answers when the host declares the game is over.

113174.name: Spy Muppets: License To Croak

videogameversion.136868: North American Game Boy Advance edition

113174.description:
User Summary

Kermit, Animal, Fozzy, Bunsen, and Beaker must stop three super-villains, Piggy Galore, Dr. Nose, and King Prawn. There are three different stories to follow, but they all are somehow connected. Eventually, they all will point in the direction of the ultimate villain.

113175.description:
Objective: be the first to collect 7 nuggets

place map into box and put your meeples on starting position (cooking cove)
knot your 12 strings to circles and put them side by side on the floor (carpet recommended)
distribute all the 12 'furniture' cards on the floor (like seen on the map)
starting position: cooking stove
draw a card out of 48 - jumping position
do NOT touch the ground jumping from one to the other
successful ==> get 1 nugget
sometime you must jump carrying the monkey on your shoulder
you may choose for another jump (max. 3 jumps) but if you fail you are going to loose all of the nuggets collected during your turn
there are 2 different cards/levels regarding jumping difficulty/distance

content: map, monkey, 12 strings, 12 furniture cards, 4 meeples with 4 stand ups, 48 (jumping) cards, 30 nuggets
113175.name: Pippi Langstrumpf

113176.name: Fish Tales: A Flip Toss Game
113176.description:
It's time for the annual fishing derby and you and your buddies have decided to make it a little more interesting this year by making a wager. Whoever catches the most fish doesn't have to buy his own drinks for the next year and there is only one thing better than fishing and that's fishing with free drinks.

Fish Tales is a flip toss game where each player takes the role of an angler trying to be the first one to catch 10 pounds worth of fish.

WHAT IS A FLIP TOSS GAME?

A flip toss game is a boardgame that uses a coin of some sort, instead of dice or cards, to determine different results during the course of the game. This is achieved by flipping a coin and trying to get it to land in a desired location on the game board.

113177.name: Star Wars: Flight Of The Falcon

videogameversion.136878: North American Game Boy Advance edition

113177.description:
Box Description:

"She may not look like much, but she's got it where it counts, kid." - Han Solo

Jump into the cockpit of the fastest ship in the galaxy to outrun, outblast, and outsmart the Empire in this all-new classic Star Wars game!

-Pilot the Millenium Falcon, along with other well-known spacecraft

-14 combat-filled missions interweaving the movie storyline with all new plot twists

-Frantic space-to-surface battles and high-speed flying action

113178.name: Dusk of the Dead
113178.description:
From Publisher's Web Page

"The long hours on the road have left you yearning for a good night’s rest at your favorite way station. Decent food, a clean bed and live entertainment have never sounded so good – especially so with those storm clouds looming on the horizon, mounting winds and periodic raindrops heralding some fouler weather to come. The warm glow of a fire and a hot meal will be welcome, but where is the wait staff?”

Dusk of the Dead is a new HackMaster adventure featuring a variety of challenges designed for four to six 5th to 7th level player characters.

Detailing a haunted location off the beaten path, Dusk of the Dead may be used by itself as a stand-alone one-shot adventure or easily placed anywhere in the wilderness of an ongoing campaign. Located in the wilderness near Frandor’s Keep, just off the Borderland Road, Dusk of the Dead may also be employed as a follow-on for characters completing the Frandor’s Keep mini-campaign and/or as an add-on or segue into the Mines of Chaos series of adventures. The adventure contains a myriad of hooks and ideas for introducing players to the scenario as well as follow-on integration for on-going play with Frandor’s Keep, the local towns of Vew and Sabden, as well as direct connections to the City-State of P’Bapar.

113179.name: Sudoku Live
113179.description:
Box Description:

The definitive SuDoku multiplayer game

-Multiplayer action!

Challenge your friends in internet or LAN matches with the Competitive and Cooperative SuDoku Live game modes, complete with a built-in chat feature.

-Single player challenge

Drag and drop any sudoku from your favourite website, or just build your own, and test your skills against the clock. You can save and load your games at any time, or print them to play elsewhere.

-Complete toolset

Pen down your numbers, or use the pencil for those numbers you are not sure about. Erase entries, take notes, and build your own puzzle easily with the SuDoku Live complete toolset.

113186.name: Super Monkey Ball Adventure
113186.description:
Box Description:

Put your monkey to the ultimate test!

Join AiAi and his friends in an adventure across five worlds with 60 quests.

-Six frantic party games! Race, fight target, bounce, tag and cannon.

-10 monkey ball powers - wood, fire, sticky and more.

-50 puzzle stages will have you racing to beat your best time.

-Five unique worlds with over 50 characters to meet and 60 quests to beat.

113187.name: Corner Kick!
113187.description:
From the publisher:

Developed over four years by the Father and Son team of Bob and Jeff Wiltrout, "Corner Kick!" is an innovative yet elegantly simple and straightforward game that produces not only games equal to the energy and excitement of the real thing, but even the elements of tactics and strategy that give it depth.

The rules have been extensively play tested and enjoyed at Conventions such as HistoriCon and Cold Wars for years, and they are now ready for you!

Besides the basic rules, there are extensive Designer's Notes which help explain the theories applied, and show how the actual tricks--some dirty!--of the game apply to the table top as well.

Playable with miniatures in several scales now available from a growing list of providers, the rules come with the full particulars of how to build your own "Pitch," Movement Sticks, and other accessories.

Two card stock Goal Cages for self assembly are provided with the book to start you off, as well as Team Rosters and a form for a play-by-play Game Record to note Stoppages and major events--a unique permanent history of your games and good times! A set of color Deflection Templates are included as well for determining where wild shots go, ricochets off the Goal frames, etc.

There is also a "Cheat Sheet" holding some 90% of all that's needed to play the game without having constantly to reference the rulebook. The 8.5" x 11" book itself is 62 pages, with three of full color photos of games and miniatures. Figure and other resources are provided to help fans of the "The Beautiful Game" get started immediately.

To quote from Bob Wiltrout's Introduction, "In our experience, people who play this game once play it again and again. In three years of play-testing, nobody has ever played Corner Kick and walked away saying, “This just doesn’t feel like soccer.” And I’m betting you won’t be the first.

You’re going to enjoy this!"

113188.name: Superman: The Man Of Steel
113188.description:
Box Description:

-Superman flies through Metropolis unaware of an impending danger.

-As Superman, you have access to all of his superpowers including flight, heat vision and freeze breath.

-Battle Brainiac 13, Lex Luthor, Metallo, Bizzaro #1, Cyborg, Mongul and other foes in lightning-fast action.

-Engage in ground and aerial battles in Metropolis, The Phantom Zone, Warworld, Deep Space and other locations.

113189.name: Subtilla
113189.description:
Subtilla is a two-player, head-to-head naval battle game. Each player has a sub, five boats, and a base on his side of the board. A player wins by either destroying all five of the opponent's boats, or by occupying both spaces of the opponent's base at the end of the opponent's turn.

Battles between ships involve dice-rolling, and the subs have special stealth, movement, and torpedo rules.

113190.name: T'ai Fu: Wrath Of The Tiger
113190.description:
Box Description:

Sink your claws into kung fu action.

-Authentic kung-fu action

Send them flyin' with moves like the Leopard Pounce and the Monkey Roll.

-20 beautifully animated levels

Strut through sweeping rivers and bamboo forests on your quest to defeat the Dragon Master.

-Legendary animal clans

Take on foes inspired by Chinese legend - from muscle-bound snakes to ferocious wild boar.

-Over 75 character moves

Unleash your Tiger attacks and Chi Power. Then finish them off with thrashing claws and razor-sharp teeth.

113191.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 3: Mutant Nightmare
113191.description:
Box Description:

Mutate your Turtle as you play!

-Unlock Turtles in Time!

-All-new target attack system

-Develop the Ultimate Turtle

-Earn experience points

In their latest adventure the Turtles are ready to work as a team! With 4 Player and Single Player Modes the Turtles are always watching each other's back and looking for action!

113192.name: Eine Reise durch Sachsen: und Sudetengau
113192.description:
Objective: be the first to travel to arrival point
learn more about folks and country
- simple 'Roll and Move' game, moving by turn -

rolling the die each player starts in Dresden
you can't kick opponents ==> your can't move if you would meet another meeple
follow instructions of field you land on - description/characterization of the place you reached is told
to all participants

remarks:
due to later occupation of 'Sudetengau' 1938 by Nazi Germany this game touches sensitive contents in the circumstances obtaining at the time

113193.name: Rigger Handbuch
113193.description:
From the back of the book:

Motoren heulen, Reifen quietschen, Schüsse peitschen ...
... Zeit für den Rigger.

Kein Runner-Team kommt ohne einen Rigger aus. Er kontrolliert die Fahrzeuge, die dem Team Unterstützung und Überwachung liefern - und oft ist der Rigger die letzte Möglichkeit zur Flucht, wenn sich die Chancen gegen die Runner stellen. Das macht den Rigger ebenso wichtig wie den Straßensamurai oder den Kampfmagier. Und kein Rigger kommt ohne seine Fahrzeuge daher ...

Das Rigger Handbuch beschreibt alle möglichen Arten von Fahrzeugen, vom Vollplastik-Elektromotorrad bis hin zur tödlichen Kanpfdrohne (und jede Menge Typen dazwischen), dazu alle nötigen Regeln, um aus einem harmlosen Serienfahrzeug den chromglänzenden, sensorenbestückten und waffenstarrenden Hochgeschwindigkeitstraum eines jeden Riggers zusammenzubauen.


User Summary:

The Rigger Handbuch is the german version of Rigger Black Book updated to the rules of the 2nd edition of Shadowrun.
It also contains additional vehicles from other sourcebooks that had been published between the original release of the Rigger Black Book and 1996, for example Corporate Security Handbook and Fields of Fire.

113194.name: Plutocracy
113194.description:
Plutocracy is a game with elements of business and politics. You are a serial investor starting and building companies. You can also collect political favors in various ways, and use those to gain an advantage to your own companies, or to slow down your competitors.

Plutocracy is a card game. The opportunities available to you in a given round is represented by your hand. Your resources are collected separately, as money and political tokens ($ and poli-chips).

There are free actions you can use each round if you cannot (or will not) play any of your cards. Events add some uncertainty. One event is the "End Game," which you can use to adjust the length of a game, by placing it in the deck either near the top for a short game, or near the bottom for a long one.

113195.name: Terminator 3: Rise Of The Machines
113195.description:
Box Description:

You are the ultimate weapon.

Initiate mission paramets for...

CRS Model T-850

- The Terminator.

Objectives:

-Advance to CRS time displacement chamber.

-Return to 2003.

Critical Priority: Protect John Connor.

Resistand:

-Mechanical: CRS army.

-Human, 2023: Tech-Com army.

-Human, 2003: Los Angeles Police Dept.

Advanced Recon:

-T-X - Activated. Technologically advanced. No known weaknesses. Stop at all costs.

Features:

-Fight - for the first time ever - as Arnold Schwarzenegger

-Survive within an additional T3 storyline

-Access unique Terminator abilities

-Terminate with explosive weapons and punishing hand-to-hand combat

-Live the complete Terminator experience from both sides of the conflict

Includes:

-Over an hour of CGI and film footage starring the motion picture cast

113196.name: That's So Raven 2: Supernatural Style

videogameversion.136900: North American Game Boy Advance edition

113196.description:
User Summary

Based upon the popular Disney live-action show That's So Raven. You control Raven, who possesses a psychic ability allowing her to see the future. Her friends and family, Chelsea, Devon, Eddie, Cory, and Dad are there to help her. This game has 6 environments and more than 20 levels.

113197.name: Unterwelt Quellenbuch
113197.description:
From the back of the book:

Ehre. Respekt. Familie.

Ohne diese Werte wäre ich nicht mehr als Drek - ein verdammter Shadowrunner. Ehre und Respekt - das unterscheidet die "Familie" von dem Abschaum, der verlangt, was rechtmäßig uns zusteht. Schmuggel, Schutzgeldringe, Bordelle... unsere Ahnen vergossen ihr Blut, um diese Imperien zu errichten. Und auch mein Blut wird fließen, um die Macht der Familie zu bewahren. Schwäche ist keine Option. Sie entehrt die Familie. Und wer die Familie entehrt, der büßt mit seinem Leben.

Wer uns keinen Respekt erweist oder nimmt, was uns gehört, dem schicken wir eine Botschaft. Erst verletzen wir ihn, dann verletzen wie seine Geschäfte, dann seine Freunde und seine Familie. Und wenn das immer noch nicht reicht... dann töten wir ihn.

Das Unterwelt-Quellenbuch beschreibt detailliert die "großen vier" internationalen kriminellen Organisationen: die Mafia, die Yakuza, die Triaden und die Seoulpa-Ringe. Es vermittelt dem Spielleiter einen tiefen Einblick in die Märkte, Unternehmungen und Traditionen der Syndikate und enthüllt ihre Vergangenheit und ihre geheimen Rituale. Darüber hinaus enthält es für Spieler wie Spielleiter ausführliche Informationen über Gangs, Terroristen, Assassinen und andere Gruppen, die in den Schatten nach ihren eigenen Gesetzen herrschen.
Das Unterwelt-Quellenbuch bietet dem Spielleiter Richtlinien für die Entwicklung von Kampagnen rund um die organisierte Kriminalität sowie ihre Anpassung an unterschiedliche Schauplätze. Es gibt ihm umfassende Regeln für alternative Kampagnen an die Hand, in denen die Spielercharaktere großen Syndikaten angehören.
Das Unterwelt-Quellenbuch bietet eine Fülle von Abenteuer-Vorschlägen, Kampagnen-Ideen, Hintergrundinformationen und viele neue Regeln für alles Shadowrun-Kampagnen. Dieses Quellenbuch ist für die Verwendung mit Shadowrun 3.01D und den Ergänzungsbänden Shadowrun-Kompendium: Jenseits der Schatten sowie Schattenzauber 3.01D gedacht.

Als besonderen Bonus finden Sie in diesem Buch aktuelle Informationen über die Gangs und Syndikate, die in der Unterwelt der ADL den Ton angeben.


User Summary

The Unterwelt Quellenbuch is the german version of the Underworld Sourcebook with additional material about the german underworld.

113198.name: Funkadelic Streets
113198.description:
From publisher blurb:

Strange things happen in the flickering neon lights of the urban jungle. Deals are made on handshakes, then broken with hand grenades. Mob runners patrol the streets in a grim parody of law and order, and the police struggle to impose rules - often succumbing to the unofficial rules of the street in the process. These are the Funkadelic Streets, a fertile ground for action detective stories and over the top criminal campaigns. This sourcebook includes:


New Allegiances
New Role Types: Experienced Cop, Hothead Rookie, Maverick Detective, Smooth Lowlife, Cop on the Take and Bruiser
The Mean Streets – Five Locations for Funkadelic Streets including All-Night Diner, Red Light District and The Nightclub
Elements of the Streets – Stake outs and Chases
All New Funkadelic Streets Feats including Catchphrase, Slap on the Wrist and Thuggery
All New Advanced Class: Superfly Mack
Plus customizable forms for D20 and OGL Modern adventure and campaigns


This PDF is just the sort of thing needed for GMs to add depth to any great d20 Modern campaign world, including Haven: City of Violence and Sanctuary: City of Secrets.

113199.name: New World Disorder
113199.description:
From publisher blurb:

Conspiracies, government clamp downs, the birth of militias and regional factions – are these the signs of a nation in chaos, or the signs of a nation that is under tightening control? During periods of confusion, there are always those who are willing to step up to the plate and reveal the dark deals made by those in power, just as there are those who are willing to defend these agendas at all costs. Enter New World Disorder – a series of guidelines, new allegiances, and tools for creating effective conspiracies, as well as the shadowy men who head them. This sourcebook includes:


All New Allegiances – The Man, Grizzled Loner, Anti-Authority, Militia, Conspiracy Theory and The Truth
Three New Tricks of the Trade: Red Herrings, Partial Red Herring, Recurring Characters
All New Templates – Spooks: Pursuer Spook, Assassin Spook, Informant Spook, Gadget Spook
All New World Disorder Feats including Alien Abductee, Clean Slate and New Age Lunatic
All New Advanced Class: Man In Black
Plus customizable forms for D20 and OGL Modern adventure and campaigns

113200.name: Angry Birds: On Thin Ice
113200.description:
This game one of the many games in the Angry Birds Series.

Board game based on the bestselling phone app Angry Birds On Thin Ice. Players build structures and try to launch his birds and destroy the opponents' buildings. In his turn player draws a card and build the structure shown before their opponents launch Angry Birds in an attempt to knock down the structure to win points!
Player with the most points in the end of the game is the winner.

Save the Angry Birds! The game of exciting skill and action based on the bestselling phone app Angry Birds On Thin Ice lets players build, launch, and destroy with fun features, including pigs with helmets, breakable ice-block building pieces, an exploding TNT box, and the large red bird character. Players draw a card and build the structure shown before their opponents launch Angry Birds in an attempt to knock down the structure-- and the pigs-- to win points! Includes 2 Angry Birds, 3 green pigs, a slingshot-style catapult launcher, structure pieces, and mission cards. 2 to 4 players. Ages 5 and up.

113201.name: Tony Hawk's Underground 2 (GBA)

videogameversion.136912: North American Game Boy Advance edition

videogamehonor.31767: 2004 Game Critics Best Sports Game of the Year Nominee

113201.description:
Box Description:

Ready to shred with Tony against Bam's team?

Join their 'round the world, spray painting, tennis ball-shooting, sick skating thrill tour!

-Focus with slo-mo action

-Leave your tag

-Skate with new moves

-Play all-new mini-games

113202.name: The Toyman's Fair

rpgissuearticle.66405: A Sneak Peak into the Toyman's Fair

113202.description:
From publisher blurb:

Inspired by the Ennie Award-nominated Construct Companion, The Toyman's Fair is a complete adventure module for Rolemaster. It is designed for adventurers from levels 8-11, but guidance is given on how to scale the encounters for both lower and higher-level parties.

Local farmers have reported strange beasts are abroad, attacking the unwary. A chance meeting reveals that these are no flesh-and-blood monsters but mechanical creations. Suspicion falls on the eccentric Parsuik Volmaire, the magical inventor known as the Toyman. The adventurers must enter his tower and discover what has befallen the Toyman, battling further clockwork nightmares and the machinations of an evil order known as the Hand of Fate.

The Toyman's Fair includes complete Rolemaster statistics for new construct creatures and six members of the Hand of Fate, with color floor plans and interior illustrations.

113203.name: True Golf: Wicked 18
113203.description:
The object is to guide the golf ball through nearly impossible obstacles (lava, statues, extremely steep hills and mountains, omnipresent water hazards, huge sand traps, floating chunks of earth, gorges, cement) as the player tries to score as low as possible in order to win the day. Using the caddy, it is possible to scan the situation before hitting the ball with an analyzer that is similar to RoboCop. The bunkers are extremely treacherous, there is lava as well as water hazards, and 'out of bounds' can be in the middle of the hole. The 'out of bounds' area could either be a platform game-style pit, an extended area of sand, or simply an unplayable rift. The game offers stroke play, match play, or tournament play.

There are also four caddies that help them. Each of them has his own personality and opinions about certain areas of each hole.

Source: Wikipedia, "True Golf: Wicked 18", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

113204.name: Ultimate Spin Doctor
113204.description:
Box Description:

Surprisingly simple... Diabolically Difficult...

Timing is everything!

It's easy to learn the few simple movements of Ultimate Spin Doctor. It's the timing of those movements that challenges your skills to the max! Work your way through an ever-increasing array of obstacles, including Lethal Spiked Mines, Dynamite Bombs, Deadly Acid Drops, Oil Slicks, Sliding Trap Doors, and more.

-Choose from Four Skill Categories.

-100 levels become progressively harder as you complete each one.

-High-quality 256-color graphics, with full music and sound.

The Greatest Challenge Since Tetris!

113205.name: VR Sports Powerboat Racing
113205.description:
Box Description:

For the ultimate racing experience just add water.

Racing in powerboats that react to the dynamics of the water, you'll crash through the waves at breakneck speed, fly off the high-speed jumps and even continue to race under the surface as you "submarine" into the ware. And you've got four laps to go.

-Under water racing - race under water with perfect vision

-9 scenic waterways of the world - from the Amazon and New York to Monaco and Japan

-3 engine classes and a total of more than 30 boats - monohulls and catamarans

-Two-player horizontal and vertical split-screen

-Multi-game play options - including Championship, Slalom, Head to Head, Challenge, Shoot-out and Time Trial

113206.name: Wakeboarding Unleashed Featuring Shaun Murray
113206.description:
Box Description:

Hang on for your life!

Rip across a lake behind a screaming speedboat, tricking through dangerous terrain with only a sliver of wakeboard between you and the blistering water below. Catch mind-blowing air in 9 exotic locations around the world----from Lake Powell to Hong Kong Harbor.

Tired already? Then steer the boat and help your friend pull off challenging technical tricks on the most realistic-looking water ever.

-Slingshot into unteathered terrain with all-new Rope Mechanics.

-Navigate the boat as your friend wakeboards in Cooperative Mode.

-Sharpen your wakeboarding skills in 9 interactive levels around the world.

113207.name: Fodboldspil: EM-84
113207.description:
This is a game which was produced when Denmark reached their first European championship (EM).

The object of the game is to win the soccer match.
The 2 players agree before the game how long they will play, and then try to move the ball in a position where they will be able to score.

Each player takes a turn, rolling a dice.
The player with the ball rolls 0,2, 4 or 6 enabling him to either move his players in position or dribbling with the ball (at double cost). After movement he will have to pass the ball at least one time (kicking it away if unable to reach a teammate). And of course score, should the opportunity arise.
The player without the ball rolls 0,2,4,6 or freekick. He will try to block the way to his goal. If he rolls a freekick, he will get the ball and start his attack.

113208.name: WCW/nWo Thunder
113208.description:
Box Description:

Feel the power

Take control of the world's greatest athletes in WCW/NWO Thunder! Dictate the rules, then break them. Only your imagination can keep you from ruling the world of professional wrestling!

Over 60 WCW and NWO Superstars, including Goldberg, Hollywood Hogan, Kevin Nash, Diamond Dallas Page, The Giant, Bret Hart, Konnan, Rowdy Roddy Piper, Curt Hennig, Saturn, Randy Savage, Chris Jericho, Sting, Raven, and more!

-Full-Screen Wrestler entrances with theme music

-Commentary from Thunder announcers Tony Schiavone & Mike Tenay

-4 wrestler Battle Royale

-Steel cage matches

-Numerous weapons

-Signature moves, taunts, and finishes

113209.name: Whac-A-Mole

videogameversion.136931: North American Game Boy Advance edition

113209.description:
Box Description:

It's a "mole" new game!

It's mole mania and you're in charge of restoring order! The moles are everywhere and it is up to you to "whac" them back to the underground. Do you have the skills to "Whac'em all?"

-11 exciting levels with unique hazards and rewards!

-Traps, combos and power-ups will have you "whacking" all day!

-Choose Arcade or Puzzle mode for worlds of wacky whacking fun!

113210.name: Wimbledon Championship Tennis
113210.description:
Box Description:

Great Features:

-24 Players: Select from 12 world class men and women pros. Each player has different strengths: serve, volley, forehand, backhand, & court coverage.

-Play Options:

Choose singles or doubles on grass, clay, or hardcourts. Play with 1, 2, 3, or 4 players*. Select exhibition play or an 8-player Wimbledon Championship draw.

-Skill Levels: Select from 10 different skill levels for competitors. Exciting play for everyone from beginners to experts.


1 or 2 Player Game unless used with Team Player adaptor (sold separately).

113211.name: X-Squad
113211.description:
Box Description:

The year is 2037, terrorists have taken over a secret military complex. X Squad, an elite covert force, is called in to eliminate the enemy and regain control.

-Ash

-Maya

-Judd

-Melinda

-Explosive Action

Take your enemies out with a sniper rifle or light them up with a flame thrower when they get close.

-Command Your 4-Person Squad

Take charge and lead your 3 squad members through intense firefights.

-Next-Generation Graphics

Experience realistic characters and amazing special effects.

113212.description:
Scenario Designer's Handbook (ISBN 978-0-9782646-8-0) is intended as a reference for those interested in designing historical scenarios for the Advanced Squad Leader game system. The book features 216 full-colour pages with a variety of information to assist in force and terrain selection, including company, battalion and divisional break-downs of the major armies that participated in the Second World War. Additional chapters deal with scenario lay-out, publishing, researching, walk-throughs of the design process and discussion regarding the various components of ASL scenarios.

Includes four complete scenarios:
Designer's Handbook Scenario 1 EXHAUSTING BUT PRODUCTIVE
Designer's Handbook Scenario 2 SIEGE WITHOUT SHELLS
Scenario SF 1.1 SOLID GOLD REAL ESTATE
Scenario MD1 THE BRIDGE AT RAMELLE

And also includes a discussion draft scenario KRUGLOWKA RAILWAY.

All are company-level recreations of tactical combat in the Second World War consistent with the ASL series of games.

Scenario Designer's Handbook is not an official publication of Multi-Man Publishing or Hasbro and neither the author nor canadiansoldiers.com/tacticalwargamer.com are in any way affiliated with MMP.
113212.name: Scenario Designer's Handbook

113213.name: Biblical Quest
113213.description:
The board is in the shape of a "Star of David". A path goes around the star and through the center. In the center of the star is a space marked "Heaven". Each point on the star is the start position for a player and is marked with a biblical person whose name starts with one of the letters in ISRAEL. Each player has a block that spells out ISRAEL.

Players roll a die to advance around the board. The spaces on the board determine what question based on the bible the player has to answer. A correct answer allows the player to roll again. If the player lands on a space marked with the name of a biblical person and answers a question correctly they get a chip to place on their block. There are spaces that give players the ability to remove a chip from other players or get a free chip. When a player has their block completely covered they must enter the Heaven space by an exact roll and answer a question correctly. If the player answers the question correctly they win the game. If the answer is incorrect the player must leave Heaven on the next turn and try again.

Essentially this is a rip-off of Trivial Pursuit.

113214.name: Dragon's Lair Trilogy
113214.description:
User Summary

Dragon's Lair Trilogy is a compilation of three classic arcade games.

Dragon's Lair
Dragon's Lair II: Time Warp
Space Ace

The graphics have been remastered to support 480p wide screen resolution.

113215.name: Rapidfire Trivia
113215.description:
User Summary

Rapidfire Trivia is an online trivia game where you compete against other players around the world in a variety of trivia categories.

113216.name: Final Fantasy IV: The Complete Collection
113216.description:
-The definitive version of one of gaming's greatest sagas.

-An all-new FINAL FANTASY IV Interlude game between FINAL FANTASY IV and The After Years that binds the two epic narratives together!

-High definition graphical updates for both FINAL FANTASY IV and The After Years!

-Play the game in the original Japanese, an updated English translation or French!

-Choose between the original soundtrack or a rearranged version of the timeless compositions of Nobuo Uematsu.

-View an exclusive collection of concept and design art by the famed artist Yoshitaka Amano.

-Brand new CGI movie intros for both FINAL FANTASY IV and The After Years.

-Enjoy the complete, uncensored FINAL FANTASY IV experience for the first time in North America - no altered graphics, scenarios, or dialogue!

Source: The Game Website.

113217.name: Just Dance Kids 2
113217.description:
The coolest dance experience for kids is back on Wii™! Featuring 40 fun and crazy dance routines to kids favorite songs, including hits from today’s most popular artists, TV shows and movies.

Just Dance Kids 2 gets kids of all ages up and dancing with colorful graphics, super-fun dance moves, and kid-friendly gameplay.

Key Features

40 All-New Dances Led by Real Kids!
Featuring songs from kids’ highest-rated TV shows, including Yo Gabba Gabba, and The Wiggles. Also featuring covers of today’s hottest hits like Love Me, Just The Way You Are, Whip My Hair, and the worldwide YouTube hit ”Gummy Bear” – over 200M views! Kids will recognize songs like Despicable Me, Something That I Want, and The Lion Sleeps Tonight from their favorite movies. Plus more remastered popular nursery rhymes for the youngest at home

Special Features for the Wii™
The Wii features classic 4-player cooperative play and the unique "Balloon Mode," where kids compete against each other to get the more items and earn more points by shaking their Wii remotes.

New and Improved Features Offer Strong Benefits for Parents on all Consoles
The non-stop shuffle mode allows Mom to select all her kids’ favorite songs for non-stop dancing. On screen lyrics lets kids learn the words and sing along as they dance. Also includes specific multilingual songs in English, Spanish, French and German!

Source: The Publisher Website.

113219.name: Kinect: Disneyland Adventures

videogamehonor.31925: 2011 Game Critics Best Social/Casual/Puzzle Game of the Year Nominee

113219.description:
Frontier’s collaboration with Microsoft Studios and Disney delivers a highly accurate, open world representation of Disneyland in Anaheim (the game's open world navigation being a first for a Kinect title).

Intended for players of all ages, “Kinect: Disneyland Adventures” is one of the biggest games ever published by Microsoft Studios packed with around 100 hours of gameplay!

- Interact with beloved park characters
- Enjoy challenging adventures!
- Dive into iconic attractions

An experience for the whole family

- Harnessing the controller free power of Kinect, “Kinect: Disneyland Adventures” allows families and Disney fans of all ages to explore Disneyland park at their own pace, enjoy attractions, engage in challenging quests, and interact with beloved Disney characters using their full bodies and voices, no controller required
- “Kinect: Disneyland Adventures” has both single and multiplayer experiences. Individuals can personalize their adventures on their own, and for those challenges that take more than one set of hands, players can work cooperatively helping each other out to collect rewards and Achievements
- Step into many of your favorite Disneyland park attractions, and explore the worlds as you embark on fantastic adventures - fly through Neverland at Peter Pan’s side and take up your sword to fight Captain Hook, battle your way to the island in Pirates of the Caribbean and partner with a friend to enjoy the fascinating world of Alice in Wonderland.
- Collect Disney-themed items and purchase popular souvenirs
- Discover new locations and game experiences, including themed parades and firework displays

Features

- Create memories. Whether it’s your first time or hundredth time exploring Disneyland park, relive your fondest memories or embark on a new adventure.
- Discover Disneyland park. Whether you want to go on an adventure in your favorite attraction or explore the entire park, “Kinect: Disneyland Adventures” allows you to play at your own pace and customize your own Disneyland park experiences right from your living room, whenever you want.
- Explore attractions. Experience your favorite Disneyland park attractions as immersive adventures — explore Neverland at Peter Pan’s side and take up your sword to fight Captain Hook; battle your way to the island in Pirates of the Caribbean; or partner with a friend to enjoy the fascinating world of Alice in Wonderland.
- Meet the characters. Share magical moments with your favorite Disney characters — hug a princess, high-five Mickey Mouse, collect autographs and accept quests.
- Collect and unlock. Collect Disney-themed items, rewards and Xbox 360 Achievements as you make your way through the park to discover new game experiences, including themed parades and firework displays.
- Cooperative play. Partner with a friend or family member to explore Disneyland park; have him or her jump in to lend a hand on difficult challenges and help you earn rewards. Designed to adjust difficulty based on skill, “Kinect: Disneyland Adventures” ensures that everyone is having fun and playing

Source: The Game Website.

113220.name: Star Fox 64 3D
113220.description:
Game Overview

Fox McCloud is Back in a Re-mastered Nintendo Classic

Star Fox 64™ 3D invites players to take on the role of legendary Fox McCloud as they lead a fearless squadron of fighters in fierce aerial combat to battle the evil forces of Andross and save the galaxy from destruction. The rich 3D visuals provide a remarkable sense of depth, distance and position as players dodge meteors and blast enemy fighters out of the sky.

- A complete graphical update brings a Nintendo classic into the era of portable 3D fun. The game makes effective use of the Nintendo 3DS system’s dual screens: The top screen features 3D aerial combat, while the bottom screen displays characters and dialogue.

- There are two control methods for the player to experience. The Nintendo 64 Mode offers original controls, while the new Nintendo 3DS Mode uses the motion controls of the built-in Gyro Sensor of the Nintendo 3DS system.

- Trusted wingmen Peppy, Slippy and Falco are along for the ride – if one of them is chased or captured by an enemy, players must act to protect them in order to keep their team strong.

- Each mission takes players through a different planet of the Lylat system as they blast enemies, collect power-ups and fight powerful bosses on their way to the final battle.

- A new multiplayer option lets up to four players engage in fierce aerial combat via a local wireless connection (using four systems and one game card via DS Download Play). The multiplayer mode also includes new power-ups and special weapons. Players can use the Nintendo 3DS system’s inner camera to display a live video feed of their faces as they battle, bringing a new level of fun and personalization to the multiplayer experience.

Source: The Publisher Website.

113222.name: The Third Year of Our Reign
113222.description:
Publisher Blurb:

THIRD YEAR OF OUR REIGN encompasses a trio of alternate settings for REIGN, Greg Stolze's game of rogues and rulers. NAIN is a realm where wizards rule with power, if not wisdom. ARDWIN takes the stereotype fantasy races of Orcs, Elves and Dwarves, then blends them in a harsh and primitive realm with nary a human to offend the eye. Finally, OUT OF THE VIOLENT PLANET moves REIGN into contemporary science fiction, presenting a setting where everyone is psychic... except us.

113224.description:
This reinforcement pack is the perfect addition to your Summoner Wars Master Set, allowing you to bring new troops to the War for Itharia, and experience the excitement of deck construction.


Piclo's Magic Includes: - 32 Cards

Deep Dwarves
•1 Piclo - Champion
•1 Deep Troll - Champion
•1 Gren - Champion
•5 Battle Mages - Common
•5 Crossbowmen - Common

Benders
•1 Kalu - Champion
•1 Talu - Champion
•1 Gwalark - Champion
•5 Parasites - Common
•5 Mind Witches - Common

Mercenaries
•1 Rygos - Champion
•5 Demon Hands - Common


The circling crows cry out as more warriors join the war. Choose your weapons and prepare for glory!
113224.name: Summoner Wars: Piclo's Magic Reinforcement Pack

126943.name: Summoner Wars: Saella's Precision Reinforcement Pack

113225.description:
They are a barbaric tribe of demon worshipers. They burn and despoil what traces of civilization they can find. They have no name for themselves, but other call them the Filth. At night their camps echo with the screams of prisoners and the gibbering of madmen. Bodies bend and snap as they are wracked by mutation - dark payment earned with dark rituals.


The Filth Faction Deck Includes: - 36 Cards

• 1 The Demagogue - Summoner
• 1 The Abomination - Champion
• 1 Horror Mutant - Mutation
• 1 Bestial Mutant - Mutation
• 1 Edible Mutant - Mutation
• 1 Claw Mutant - Mutation
• 1 Tentacle Mutant - Mutation
• 1 Winged Mutant - Mutation
• 1 Spew Mutant - Mutation
• 1 Corpulent Mutant - Mutation
• 6 Zealots - Common
• 6 Cultists - Common
• 3 Shield of the Hopeful Events
• 2 Possessed Wall Events
• 2 Heretic’s Rebuke Events
• 2 Channel Corruption Events
• 3 Wall Cards
• 1 Summoner Reference Card
• 1 Mutation Rules Card

Microbadge:

Summoner Wars fan: The Filth
113225.name: Summoner Wars: The Filth Faction Deck

113226.description:
Objective: see base-game

'Das Hamburg-Spiel 300 Ergänzungsfragen' is an expansion and can't be played by itself; to play with it, you need 'Das Hamburg-Spiel' as well as the full rules for setup and gameplay.
113226.name: Das Hamburg-Spiel  300 Ergänzungsfragen

113227.description:
A Summoner gone rogue calls on the mercenaries of Itharia to aid him in his cause.


The Mercenary Faction Deck Includes: - 36 Cards

• 1 Rallul - Summoner
• 1 Etch - Champion
• 1 The Seer - Champion
• 1 Mundol - Champion
• 7 Apprentice Mages - Common
• 6 Stone Golems - Common
• 5 Rune Mages - Common
• 2 Magic Pulse Events
• 2 Channeled Summon Events
• 2 Wall Transference Events
• 2 Reform Stone Events
• 1 Fury of Godshome Event
• 3 Wall Cards
• 1 Summoner Reference Card
• 1 Mercenary Rules Card
113227.name: Summoner Wars: Mercenaries Faction Deck

113228.description:
This reinforcement pack is the perfect addition to your Summoner Wars Master Set, allowing you to bring new troops to the War for Itharia, and experience the excitement of deck construction.


Taliya's Spirit Includes: - 32 Cards

Shadow Elves
•1 Taliya - Champion
•1 Kuldrid - Champion
•1 Melek - Champion
•5 Blade Masters - Common
•5 Hunters - Common

Sand Goblins
•1 Sand Wyrm - Champion
•1 Stink - Champion
•1 Tark - Champion
•5 Slayers - Common
•5 Bombers - Common

Mercenaries
•1 Hulgorad - Champion
•5 Bounders - Common


The circling crows cry out as more warriors join the war. Choose your weapons and prepare for glory!
113228.name: Summoner Wars: Taliya's Spirit Reinforcement Pack

boardgamehonor.24018: 2013 Boardgames Australia Awards Best Australian Game Nominee

113229.description:
Viewpoint Reflections is the first expansion to the Viewpoint card game. It can be played as a stand-alone game or combined with the original Viewpoint. Viewpoint Reflections adds seventy additional cards and introduces new characters, including the Lazy Eye Guys - Dirk and Pedro - and the Evil Eye Pet.

The release of Viewpoint Reflections also sees the introduction of new keywords - PASS and REPLACE.

PASS is essentially a weaker version of the STEAL action because the player "targeted" gets to select the card to give to the other player.

REPLACE allows you to remove a card from your Field of View and "replace" it with another card from the top of the Draw Pile.

Viewpoint Prize Cards are also included in 1-in-10 Viewpoint Reflections decks.
113229.name: Viewpoint Reflections

113230.name: MARCO POLO REISE-SPIEL Italien
113230.description:
Objective: collect as many bonus points as possible, but don't miss to be back home on time
- tactical (geographical) quiz - so called on back of box
3 phases - moving by turn - each player starts on his marked/coloured area
I move around collecting cards/images
II answer questions regarding images/cards you hold - if you fail discard card
III get back home (can be difficult) - don't miss the plane/boat
content:
1 board, 60 cards/images, 6 ports/cards, 20 red chips, 4 vehicles with stand-ups, 8 'double-sided' stones to point out directions, 2 rain slides, 1 die, 1 rule
3 similar editions existing for France, Germany & US

113233.name: Głębia przestrzeni. Kosmiczna gra fabularna. Wersja demonstracyjna.
113233.description:
User's summary:

Polish space opera, science fiction roleplaying game. Free Introductory Rules.

113234.name: Paradyzja
113234.description:
User's summary:

First adventure for Głębia przestrzeni, apparently loosely based on one of the Novels by Janusz Andrzej Zajdel.

113235.name: Pfad nach Aventurien
113235.description:
(User summary)

A 16-page introduction to the both role-playing and the fourth edition of Das Schwarze Auge, downloadable in pdf format free of charge from Ulisses' web site.

Includes the scenario Festlichkeit und Ogerwanst.

113236.name: They Became Flesh (1km1kt edition)

rpgpodcastepisode.108088: They Became Flesh Actual Play Episode 1

113236.description:
From Introduction:

Before the creation of mankind, God created the angels. The angels served God faithfully as he created Adam and Eve, and the Garden of Eden. One angel watched as God forbade Adam and Eve to eat from the Tree of the Knowledge of Good and Evil: "Why do you give your children tests?" the angel asked.

TO PROVE THEIR LOVE, was God’s response.

Adam and Eve ate from the Tree of the Knowledge of Good and Evil, and God cast them from the Garden to live in pain and darkness for the rest of their lives. The angel came to God again: "Why create your children with curiosity and then cast them down for being curious?"

YOURS IS NOT TO QUESTION, BUT TO SERVE, was God’s response.

"But your children were made to question, and you punished them for it," said the angel, whose name was Lucifer.

And God turned his face from Lucifer, and Lucifer wept.

113237.description:
Flames of War: Burning Empires is a hardcover supplement for the Flames of War World War II miniatures game system. It is about the Early War battles in North Africa in 1940 and 1941. It contains armylists, scenarios, painting guides and background information about the battles that took place.

Included are the army lists that did not make it into Hellfire and Back, for example the Fucilieri, Greeks, and French.

In addition, rules and scenarios are included to fight out small raiding force actions, for example the British Long Range Desert Group and the Italian Sahariana
113237.name: Flames of War: Burning Empires – The Battle for the Mediterranean

113242.description:
Everyone is informed of the terrible cataclysm which endangers this little planet at the far end of our galaxy. We have to help the different races that inhabit it, as they have no choice that to seek refuge on new planets. Today, we learned that Earth will welcome 5 different extraterrestrial tribes: the Bloups, the Paroks, the Faars, the Mutas and the Napils. The issue is that no-one is able to predict how these 5 species will co-habit together...

The game is played in several turns, each made of 2 phases:
- New Flouks
- Entrance in the Village

Each player takes 4 cards, keeps 2 of them and give the 2 others to his neighbors. Everyone then choose one of the cards in his hand and play it simultaneously. The cards are resolved in the following order: Decrees, Flouks, Chief Flouks then Actions.

Decrees have an effect only on their owner: it increases the amount of a type of Flouks depending on a some conditions. The action of a decree lasts all game long and we can have only 1 decree per village.

The Flouks are only used to populate the village. The Chiefs Flouks can enter a village only if a Flouk of the same specy is already there. The Chief has a power which apply when he enters the village.

The actions all have different effects that apply only when they are played.
113242.name: Flouk

113243.name: Rum Run
113243.description:
It’s the 1920s. There’s prohibition and... sadness. The townspeople cry out for an unsobering savior! You don’t know the first thing about brewing, but there’s rumor about of secret distilleries deep in the forest. If only you could find them, you could caravan back these barrels of liquid joy and become the pride of the town. That is, if the other would-be heroes don’t get to them first. Do you have what it takes to claim that oh-so-coveted title, Regent of Rum?

If you like dominos, and you like mancala, then you'll love The Rum Run! At its simplest, this game entails building roads from the town center, acquiring barrels, and bringing them back. At its most strategic, you'll be at constant warfare with other players; racing them to distilleries, breaking their roads, building over them, and stealing their barrels. Be prepared to think not one or two, but six or seven moves ahead!

113244.name: The Godling Ascendant
113244.description:
Publisher's blurb:

From the heroes of Greek myth to the annals of fantasy fiction, the god-touched have fired our imagination. Where The Genius Guide to the Godling introduced this archetype to gaming, and The Genius Guide to Mystic Godlings expanded it, The Genius Guide to the Godling Ascendant now builds further upon the popular character type. This meaty title expands the classes even further, with rules for using godling abilities to create exemplar monsters, new ways for characters with non-godling classes to represent scions of immortal power, and new divine traits, ascendancies, scion talents, and feats for the four godling classes. All of that, along with new ways to introduce the concept of godlings into your campaign.

The Genius Guide series of products introduces new possibilities to your Pathfinder or OGL campaign and gives everyone at the table a chance to expand the horizons of the game and create adventures that are truly fantastic.

113245.name: Midnight Harvest
113245.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Cthulhu meets Savage Worlds—just in time for your Halloween bash!

A rash of missing children, the discovery of unholy texts, gibbering lunatics wandering the streets, and a famous Halloween fete featuring costumes by some of the country’s most celebrated designers—including a few that seem a tiny bit too realistic. Is something else going on behind the scenes of this townwide party? The investigators must piece together the disparate clues before the event reaches its blasphemous goal—if they want to stop the Midnight Harvest!

Midnight Harvest is the first in an innovative new series of Cthulhoid Savage Worlds scenarios and supplements from Super Genius Games. It contains everything a Savage Worlds group needs for an evening’s worth of Savaged Mythos-inspired fun, including pregenerated characters and Sanity rules for towns!

113246.name: Happy Birthday
113246.description:
Originally designed especially for the Italian game shop chain Città del Sole, they used to give it as a present to children for their birthday.

There are birthday parties everywhere and animals wander to wood, pasture, house and pond to celebrate. The guest cards need to be deposited in the correct sequence at the party cards, the first player to discard all cards wins the game. The party cards are laid out, the guest cards are dealt to the players. In his turn a player must place one card and may place more. The first card next to a party card must be a 1 or 6, the following cards must be in sequence, ascending or descending. If a player cannot or does not want to place a card, he must draw a card, if the stack is finished he must place a card if he can.

Premise and Gameplay From Publisher: All the animals must attend the most correct birthday party: in the wood, at the farm, at home or inside the pond. But at the entrance they find a special command, so players must be really skilfull to try to get rid of all their cards, sending all the animals to the correct birthday party. The game mechanism is quite free and players will decide how many cards to play at each turn; they can even not play any card, but instead pick up a new one.

113247.name: New Rules, New Missions
113247.description:
User Summary:

New Rules, New Missions is a 44-page booklet that presents a smattering of additional rules—including new "weapons" for various Conflicts, and rules for saddling up a rabbit mount—alongside a host of welcome setting material: a new patrol culled from the pages of the second Mouse Guard comic series, three new Settlements—Flintrust, Grasslake, and Sandmason—, the addition of Celanawe to Kenzie's patrol as a playable character, and three brand new exciting Missions!

113248.name: Hör genau
113248.description:
An educational game to promote the acoustic sound insulation. Ideally suited to school in preparation for kindergarten age amd is especially recommended for dyslexic students in early education..
Game is based on initial sounds. There are 72 cards and 4 cards per initial sound in this game.
