113433.description:
User Summary

In this issue: Opening Fire, NOVA Works, The World "Out There," Movie Releases, Convention Calendar, 10 O'clock News, Nuts & Bolts, Quotes, Duelslang, Combat Rock, Cube Logs, Classic Cubes, Convention Reports, The Showroom, The NOVA Files, Closing Fire, & Murphy's Corner.

113434.name: Nightmessenger (Vol 14 No 4 - Winter 2050)
113434.description:
User Summary

In this issue: Opening Fire, NOVA Works, The World "Out There," Movie Releases, Convention Calendar, The 10 O'clock News, Nuts & Bolts, Quotes, Cube Logs, In the Arena, The Showroom, & Closing Fire.

113435.name: Nightmessenger (Vol 15 No 1 - Spring 2051)
113435.description:
User Summary

In this issue: Opening Fire, NOVA Works, The World "Out There," Movie Releases, Convention Calendar, The 10 O'clock News, Nuts & Bolts, Quotes & Duelslang, Cube Logs, In the Arena, The NOVA Files, Return Fire, The Showroom, & Closing Fire.

113436.description:
Genegrafter is a superhero card and dice game that was designed to be easy to pick up and start playing within minutes but still offer enough complexity so that more advanced players won’t get bored.

The core game is comprised of a deck of 54 cards that include Characters, Abilities, and Events. The goal of the game is to have more Genetic Markers than your opponents when the last DNA Strand is revealed.

To do so, you will have to make the best use of your Characters and Abilities as you draw them from the main deck (all players draw from the same deck). Game play is also randomly affected by Event cards that can completely change who is winning or losing. The core game includes hand manipulation, resource management (your Characters and Abilities), bluffing, and blind luck (dice and Event cards) which make each game interesting and unique.

Genegrafter is currently available only on Kickstarter and will offer customization and additional expansions.
113436.name: Genegrafter

113437.name: xPirate
113437.description:
Come set sail with xPirate - the world's first-ever game that combines a traditional game board with the iPhone, iPod Touch or iPad! The iPad/iPhone/iPod acts as a "Game Master", controlling elements of what happens to the pirates as they search for buried treasure.

Object of the Game

Travel across dangerous waters on the hunt for 4 hidden treasures before sailing back home for victory!

Treasures - include gold, jewels, supplies & secret treasures.
Islands - while searching for treasure, you can trade on the island markets - buying and selling what you need to survive your journey.
Beware - you'll encouter raging typhoons, dangerous krakens, deadly ship attacks, skeleton armies and even attacks from your fellow players!

113438.name: Bakugan: Defenders of the Core
113438.description:
The Brawls Just Got Bigger!

For the first time ever, ultimate monsters come to life in all-out brawls. In Bakugan: Defenders of the Core, you'll seize real-time control of towering Bakugan as you unleash their fury in action-packed battles. A thrilling action game that merges fighting and stealth adventure gameplay into one awesome experience, you'll control skyscraper-sized Bakugan in your quest to save the world's cities from the evil Spectra and his Vexos armies. The fate of humankind is in your hands!

Source: The Game Website.

113439.name: Barbie: Jet, Set & Style!
113439.description:
Jet the Globe with Barbie™ as her top fashionista in this ultra-glamorous video game, Barbie® Jet, Set & Style!™. There are REAL styling activities for you to do as you travel with Barbie™ in the jet salon to 10 exotic cities styling HAIR-tastic hair and performing fabulous make overs on clients from around the world. The game is available this September on Wii™ and Nintendo DS™ and DSi™.

Features

- Style totally-new HAIRtastic hairstyles such as cutting, highlighting, extensions, curling and more for each and every one of your clients.
- Perform make up makeovers, design and manicure nails and style outfits choosing from trendy to sporty to ultra-glamorous fashions.
- Earn fashionista points throughout your world-wide styling assignments in preparation to style Barbie™ herself for her Global Glam Fashion Show escorted by non-other than Ken™.
- Using the Nintendo DSi™ camera, design a T-shirt for your clients showing off your fashionista skills

Source: The Publisher Website.

113441.name: Beastly
113441.description:
Kyle Kingson is the spoiled, shallow prince of his high school kingdom but when he humiliates a witch-like classmate, she retaliates by transforming him into someone as unattractive on the outside as he is on the inside. Now he has one year to find someone to love him in his new physical state – or he will remain “Beastly” forever. Play the companion video game to the exciting CBS Films motion picture and live the fantasy.

Features

- 7 3D environments from the movie
- 14 mini-games
- Make friends with the movie character on the Academy’s social network
- Collect pictures, biographies and movie clips
- You are not re-playing the movie scene by scene, you are living the story with your own character.

Source: The Publisher Website.

113442.name: Nightmessenger (Vol 15 No 2 - Summer 2051)
113442.description:
User Summary

In this issue: Opening Fire, NOVA Works, The World "Out There," Movie Releases, Convention Calendar, The 10 O'clock News, Nuts & Bolts, Quotes & Duelslang, Cube Logs, Return Fire, The Showroom, & Closing Fire.

113443.name: Beastly Frantic Foto
113443.description:
Kyle Kingson is the spoiled, shallow prince of his high school kingdom but when he humiliates a witch-like classmate, she retaliates by transforming him into someone as unattractive on the outside as he is on the inside. Now he has one year to find someone to love him in his new physical state – or he will remain “Beastly” forever. A fast-paced “spot-the-difference” experience based on the exciting CBS Films motion picture.

Features

- Over 80 photos to spot the difference
- With 15 differences to spot in each photo and only 5 to find with each puzzle, old photos still offer new gameplay.
- Play with or against friends
- 3 difficulty levels to test your skills
- 4 different items can help the player during gameplay.

Source: The Publisher Website.

113444.name: Nightmessenger (Vol 15 No 3 - Fall 2051)
113444.description:
User Summary

In this issue: Opening Fire, NOVA Works, The World "Out There," Movie Releases, Convention Calendar, The 10 O'clock News, Nuts & Bolts, Quotes, Cube Logs, GenCon 2000, The Showroom, & Closing Fire.

113445.name: Nightmessenger (Vol 15 No 4 - Winter 2051)
113445.description:
User Summary

In this issue: Opening Fire, NOVA Works, The World "Out There," The 10 O'clock News, Movie Releases, Convention Calendar, Nuts & Bolts, Quotes, Cube Logs, In the Arena, Return Fire, Bits & Pieces, The Showroom, & Closing Fire.

113446.name: Giant Battle
113446.description:
Giant Battle is a 2-player print and play game about the brutality of the factions during the time where great wars occur to prove who is the better faction.

In this age of power and greed, every faction in the world are battling it out to find out who is better king among all kings. Players will take turns maneuvering their unit on the battlefield, making clever decision to eliminate the opposing faction's leader. And in this game if one of the leader of either faction dies, the game ends and the faction with the surviving leader considered victorious.

You will control either a dwarf clan or the orcs battling each other on a 5x5 board. Each turn player have 2 moves and 2 actions at their disposal. Some unit have special ability triggers by just be adjacent with their leader. Some unit have the ability to attack from afar and have the healing ability. Both player will try to eliminate opposing leader to win the game.

Visit us and play more games at http://experimentalplayground.blogspot.com/

113447.name: Nightmessenger (Vol 16 No 1 - Spring 2052)
113447.description:
User Summary

In this issue: Opening Fire, NOVA Works, The World "Out There," The 10 O'clock News, Movie Releases, Convention Calendar, Nuts & Bolts, Quotes, Cube Logs, In the Arena, On the Track, Return Fire, Murphy's Corner, The Showroom, & Closing Fire.

113448.name: Nightmessenger (Vol 16 No 2 - Summer 2052)
113448.description:
User Summary

In this issue: Opening Fire, NOVA Works, The World "Out There," The 10 O'clock News, Movie Releases, Convention Calendar, Nuts & Bolts, Quotes, Cube Logs, The Showroom, & Closing Fire.

113449.name: Nightmessenger (Vol 16 No 3 - Fall 2052)
113449.description:
User Summary

In this issue: Opening Fire, NOVA Works, The World "Out There," The 10 O'clock News, Movie Releases, Convention Calendar, NOVA Projects, Return Fire, Nuts & Bolts, Quotes, In the Arena, The GenCon Road Trip, Cube Logs, The Showroom, & Closing Fire.

113450.name: Nightmessenger (Vol 16 No 4 - Winter 2052)
113450.description:
User Summary

In this issue: Opening Fire, NOVA Works, The World "Out There," The 10 O'clock News, Movie Releases, Convention Calendar, Return Fire, Nuts & Bolts, Quotes, Cube Logs, The Showroom, & Closing Fire.

113451.name: Nightmessenger (Vol 17 No 1 - Spring 2053)
113451.description:
User Summary

In this issue: Opening Fire, NOVA Works, The World "Out There," The 10 O'clock News, Movie Releases, Convention Calendar, Return Fire, Nuts & Bolts, In the Arena, Quotes, Cube Logs, The Showroom, & Closing Fire.

113452.name: Build-a-Bear Workshop: Friendship Valley
113452.description:
It's a Pawsome good time!

Help your Build-A-Bear Workshop furry friends make Friendship Valley the most furbulous town of all! Explore the 3D world, customize the town, go on quests and play mini-games, all while having bearific fun!

Features

• Choose your special furry friend from 13 playable and customizable characters.
• Decorate and transform the town by replacing bricks and wood, changing the color of doors and windows, planting flowers and more.
• Build, decorate and customize your furry friend's house with wallpaper, furniture, and plants! Even build your own car!

Source: The Developer Website.

113453.name: Nightmessenger (Vol 17 No 2 & 3 - Summer 2053)
113453.description:
User Summary

In this issue: Opening Fire, NOVA Works, The World "Out There," 10 O'clock News, Convention Calendar, Movie Releases, NOVA Projects, Nuts & Bolts, In the Arena, Quotes, The Showroom, Cubelogs, & Closing Fire.

113454.name: Cabela's Adventure Camp
113454.description:
Overview

Summer camp meets the ultimate theme park experience in this exciting game for the great outdoors. Cabela’s Adventure Camp is a thrilling motion-based game that delivers engaging, easy to learn gameplay that offers summer camp fun for everyone! Cabela’s Adventure Camp is a captivating, wild ride that’s perfect for the whole family, young and old!
 
Key Features

-Eight Exciting Games: Thrill Hill Biking, Wild River Kayaking, Full Throttle Wave Riding, Skeet Shooting, Castaway Fishing, Archery Arcade, Hogwhacked, Ice Breaker and loads of camp-style competitions!
 
-Interactive Spectator Griefing:  Ever want to mess with your friend or brother while they’re playing? Now’s your chance! Make trees or rocks fall so the player needs to react quickly. Will it be quickly enough?
 
-Entertainment for the Entire Family: This pick up and play game is engaging and exciting entertainment suitable for kids of every age.

Source: The Publisher Website.

113456.description:
Packs Of War Each Rank
NON-Collectible Deck-building Tactical Military Card Game ==

"INTRODUCING THE BUILD QUEUE"
REPLAYABLE
Instead of a hand of cards, units come into play after being flipped faceup and waiting a certain number of turns in a Build Queue (BQ), think of an assembly line of four stacks of cards manufacturing forces. The way players manage their BQ greatly affects what units come out and when, which then affects their opponent’s decisions in <i>their</I> BQ. We are very proud of this innovation and how many strategies arise when deck-building. The more cards you flip, the more you reveal to your opponent.

PORTABLE
POWER is a card game played on a Battlefield, a 4×8 grid where unit cards are used as game pieces with movement and range as they engage in combat and advance towards the opponent’s Headquarters to victory. No board or mat is necessary to play, just your P.O.W.E.R. – Packs Of War Each Rank.

SCALABLE
5 GAME RANKS!! Earn your stripes as you ascend in level of experience and POWER®, starting at the Private Rank game all the way to Master Sergeant Rank – each Game Rank offering new ways to choose your cards and compete. Several expansion packs are already designed and ready for print!

A.S.A.P.
As SIMPLE As Possible! No rulers, no protractors, no terrain constraints (yet) – just a 6-way rock-paper-scissor-lizard-Spock mechanic and the BQ is all the complexity it needs to appeal to all gamers.

>>> 2015 - DICE VARIANT ADDED
We listened. Did the math. And responded. Look for the POWER DICE RULES VAR#1 card.

The Air/Sea Expansion packs will be released as print-on-demand through Drive Thru Cards.
More expansion packs planned come with equipment cards, different themes, time periods, nationalities, and realism.
113456.name: POWER

113458.name: Realms of the Haunting

videogamehonor.29596: 1998 D.I.C.E. Best Adventure Game of the Year Nominee (Computer)

113458.description:
User Summary

"The battleground between ultimate good and evil."

Realms of the Haunting is a first-person puzzle + FPS game interwoven with cinematic cutscenes. The player takes the role of Adam, a young man whose father had recently passed away but before his death had sent a mysterious package. The package leads you to a seemingly empty house where you become locked inside. As you search through the house, you will find items and clues to help you solve the mystery of your father's death and weapons to fight off the demons which come out to stop you.

113459.name: 2149'ers
113459.description:
In the year 2149 a new gold rush has begun. This time the mineral rich lands are in the asteroid belt just beyond Mars. You and your fellow prospectors have gone in together on a Martian Processing Plant and you've each bought a mining ship to begin harvesting the riches of the asteroid belt. Although you may have bought-in together, you have no intention of sharing your riches with your competition.

This is a competitive game of resource collection and market management for 2-5 players. Each of you will manage your fuel, cargo, and the market to gain the most credits and win the game!

Players send their rockets to different asteroids around Mars and mine materials to sell on the Earth Resource Exchange. Players must keep a close eye on the size of their cargo hold, the fuel in their tanks, and actions of the other miners.

As you collect these materials, the other miners will know where to go to get them and you have to make strategic choices to decide where you will place your rocket and any revealed materials. Players trade materials in for credits, which they can use to buy upgrades and fuel for their rockets.

113460.name: Kinect Googly Eyes
113460.description:
Create your own puppet show! Scan in your stuff, place googly eyes on it and bring it to life with your movement and voice. Create a special post for your favorite social network site or just goof off for the family!

Source: The Publisher Website.

113461.name: Kinect Sparkler
113461.description:
Paint with light! Use your body and fingers to paint with sparklers. Pose by yourself or with friends and then paint or write messages around yourselves in 3D! Your room becomes your canvas. Share your masterpiece with your friends and family when you're done.

Source: The Publisher Website.

113462.name: Neues vom Räuber Hotzenplotz
113462.description:
Objective: get as many coins as possible from the treasure of the bandit Hotzenplotz; game ends if all coins are gone
- moving by turn, hide & seek -
game is split into different stages
each stage runs like:
1 one player hides the Hotzenplotz-tiles (traps, footmarks & treasure) on the board
2 other players roll 2 dice ==> subtract: difference to move;
choose, which of your meeples may walk; if you land on a symbol
3 flip a tile: trap ==> remove meeple; footmarks ==> all players know the symbol the must search behind; treasure; take two coins & and hide tiles for a new stage

113468.name: Love Trivia
113468.description:
Similar to Trivial Pursuit with 2500 questions and answers on seduction.
Players roll the dice, move around the board and answer the fun questions collecting the pieces of each color.

Love Trivia Gold is a real encyclopedia of everything you need to know. Over 500,000 games sold to date.

113469.name: Knotted
113469.description:
Players compete to create the longest path possible by laying tiles in front of their own tokens. Points are awarded for each tile traversed and the winner is the player who scores the most points.

The play is fast and simple making it a family friendly game.

113470.name: Coups d'un soir
113470.description:
30 girls, rated from 1 to 10 depending on their physical appearance, the higher the value, the higher the requirement in four categories: class, masculinity, morality and success.

Players have three types of card: Arguments, Joker or Bitch Slap.

The first ones can be played only during your turn. others can be played at any time.

Combine enough of class, masculinity, morality or success to accumulate conquest, score points and become the king of the evening ...

The game can be played over 30 to 60 minutes.

113471.name: Glück in der Liebe
113471.description:
Objective:
be the first passing the finish line (field 50) together with a partner
- moving by turn (with exceptions) -
each player starts as a 'single', handicapped moving forward
depending on the colour of the field you land on ==>
- being coppled (married) - now moving becomes easier
- being divorced
- being frustrated
- moving for- or backwards
- being safe
- being blocked

remarks:
title ('lucky in love') could lead to some misunderstandings because it's more or less a 'Rool & Move' game with a
certain chance of getting trouble (missing luck)

113473.name: Cinglés des jeux
113473.description:
Each player chooses a figurine and puts it on the start line.

In his turn, the active player rolls a die and moves his figurine as many spaces indicated by the dice.
According to the space he lands, he plays a card from categories "Game", "Sport" or "Game Chrono".
He chooses question from the card and opponent who must answer that. If opponent answer correctly, he moves as many spaces indicated on the card. If not the current player moves.

Player who reach around the stage first receive the World Cup and is the winner of the game!

113474.name: Deceive and Decide
113474.description:
From the back of the box...

"Deceive and Decide is a hilarious word-bluff game: the players deceive each other with made-up definitions to words you probably never heard. Then they decide which outrageous definition is correct.

Deceive and Decide contains 1000 obscure words complete with pronunciations which are known only to the poker-faced Word Master. Each player concocts his own whacky definition and the Word master reads them all allowed, including the real one. The players vote on the definition that seems most plausable - and everyone wins.

The game goes 'round the table at a razzle-dazzle pace as each player yakes his turn at Word Master. The definitions range from ludicrous to bizarre - if you can stop laughing long enough, you may even want to add up the score.

Imagine creating defintiions for words such as:

Beccabunga
Gardyloo
Dorking
Xylophonist"

This game sounds similar to Balderdash, but there is no board and the card layout and playing equipment is quite different.

113475.name: Domino 4
113475.description:
Domino 4 is a game of dominoes but each tile is divided by the square diagonally and includes dominoes from 0 / 1 to 4 / 4, fourteen types of dominos in four colors. Add four jokers - the equivalent of 0 / 0 - and you have sixty tiles.

Gilles Monnet devised a simple rule, but interesting. While the classic domino game are done in one dimension, Domino 4 is a game in two dimensions. Tiles can be placed so that all numbers fits with other adjacent tiles but diagonals may be turn in 2 ways.

113477.name: Federacja Appalachów
113477.description:
User's summary:

fans expansion for Neuroshima RPG which details one of the regions of Nuked States - Federation of Appalachs. It has a bit different theme than the rest of the Neuroshima setting. At least one of the original Neuroshima designers likes it very much.

113478.name: Die lustigen Skihäschen
113478.description:
Objective: be the first passing finish line (= one full circle into middle of the board) with all your (4) meeples
- simple 'Roll & Move' game, similar to Pachisi -
- moving by turn -
roll the die, step out if you throw a '1'
rules different to Pachisi:
your meeple is safe (can't be thrown out) if placed on a red field (12x)
putting two meeples of the same colour onto same field = barrier, can't be passed by anyone

113479.name: Jeu du bêtisier
113479.description:
The Game of famous situations and sentences.
Player move their pawns around the board back to their starting square answering questions and guessing the authors of famous situations/sentences. Player who finish first is the winner.

There are 110 cards and 1100 situations often known, you need to attribute to the author. Dou You know what did or said Audiard, Guitry, Santini or Van Damme?

113480.name: Love Party
113480.description:
Love Party is funny trivia games about Love.
The goal is finish first together with Your parner.

To score points, players must go through the game with partners found on the game's three phases in order: romance, love and sex and answer the questions of these categories.

With your card, you build adventures that go in the order of the dredge to love and sex. Of course, your opponents do not give up the pants! Surprises, dirty tricks, breaks and exchanges, anything goes.

113481.name: Grotesque Tactics 2: Dungeons and Donuts
113481.description:
Grotesque Tactics 2: Dungeons & Donuts begins as the citizens of the Kingdom of Glory celebrate their victory over the Dark Church. While in the catacombs of their former enemies, their revelry is disturbed by a sudden all-encompassing fog. Those that remain alive after the strange attack, barricade themselves in the depths of the catacombs. As time passes, food becomes scarce and the people of the Kingdom of Glory begin to realize that they might all meet their demise. The ‘heroic’ Knights of Glory, shady mercenaries and the arrogant high elves band together into guilds in order to survive and escape the dank catacombs. Unfortunately, the guilds are far too concerned with their distaste for each other, thus allowing for an awakening of dark forces in the dungeons below.

Source: The Game Website.

113482.name: Rochard
113482.description:
Rochard is a PSN-exclusive game where manipulating gravity and using the G-Lifter (a gravity device used to easily move weighty objects around) are crucial elements for success. With the help of his sci-fi mining tools and taking advantage of the laws of physics, the protagonist John Rochard will carry you through a game packed with puzzles, action, humor, great music, excellent level design and a story rich of twists.

• 5 long Chapters crammed with fast-paced platforming action and mind-bending puzzles based on gravity
• A beautifully crafted cartoonish visual style, rich with humor and personality
• Incredible items able to influence gravity and grab, swing and throw objects to solve puzzles or get rid of enemies
• A groovy soundtrack composed by Markus “Captain” Kaarlonen from Poets of the Fall, mixing southern rock/blues and 80′s inspired electronic music
• The legendary performance of Jon St. John as the voice of protagonist John Rochard
• The most advanced use of the Unity engine in a videogame

Source: The Game Website.

113484.name: The Bad Seed
113484.description:
From Introduction:


Your Mission

When you become an agent, you dream of travel to exotic, faraway lands, gambling over mountains of chips in Monte Carlo, or sipping champagne overlooking the Riviera while reflecting upon a job well done. One does not, under any circumstances, think of Boise, Idaho, the Pumpkin Festival, or, be still my heart, a convergence of the two, yet you find yourself trampling through a dark, muddy corn field in the dead of night, looking for God knows what. Let’s back up a little bit to where it all began…


The Mission Brief

People are disappearing in Boise—five in the past week. Wanting to avoid a widespread panic, pranksters, or copycats across the country, local government officials have unsuccessfully attempted to handle the situation on their own. A few hours ago — Natalie Brooks — a friendly has reached out to Oblivion and the agents are sent to get to the root of the problem as discretely as possible. As such, only pistols or other small arms are available as part of loadouts and the characters are placed on a commercial flight with covers as FBI agents.

113485.name: Pjovert
113485.description:
PJOVERT - a partygame below the belt!

What are you going to do, when the evening needs an extra twist? Pull out your Pjovert!

Pjovert, drawn and invented by Morten Ingemann, Ruth Lorentzen, Svend Schat-Holm and Susanne Ingemann Schat-Holm, is a new funny game with questions about everything that happens below the belt.

Even though the game is naughty in a funny way, you will not be embarresed, when you play Pjovert - you will get lots of laughs and new knowledge. There are 6 categories, with 100 questions or tasks about life downunder.

Quick to start: Roll the two dice, move your pjovert around on the board, and answer a question or do a task. In that way you can win rings. Whoever gets 6 different coloured rings around his pjovert wins the game!

A game takes 30-60 minutes, and can be played by two to six players.

113486.name: Dragon Saga: New Origins – Into the Darkness
113486.description:
In a world where Dragons roam the land and the heavens, there exists a civilization with extraordinary magical powers. This world, the world of Dragon Saga, will take new adventurers into the discovery of its riches and traditions. Since the close of the Dragon War, dragons and humans lived in peace on separate worlds - humans on their homeland, and dragons exiled to the depths of the Aether.

It was not to last.

Consumed with the desire for revenge, the Dark Dragon Elga led a revolt that brought the death of the Dragon Lord and an invasion of the human world.

One thousand years have passed since the Five Heroes of legend defeated Elga in battle, and imprisoned him in the labyrinth prison of the Shadow Cabinet.

But, peace never had a chance, it seems. Paris, one of the Five Heroes that defeated Elga, in her unending thirst for power, offers a deal to her ancient enemy, Elga. Paris offers her heart in exchange for immortality and everlasting youth. In turn, Elga is promised freedom by Paris. Paris, however, betrays Elga and locks him up in Drakos Tower.

Blinded and corrupted by the immense power, Paris launches an attack against her old friends with the Ice Dragon, Kryos, by her side. Starting another bloody war in the world of Dragon Saga. But she underestimated the courage of the heroes of Dragon Fellowship, as Kryos was defeated and Paris was forced to go hiding once again.

Now, fuming with her hatred against the Fellowship heroes, she returns to Elga in hopes of gaining a powerful ally.

A terrible mistake, it seems, by Paris. Since Elga has been waiting for his moment of revenge ever since he was betrayed by Paris. Filled with interminable rage, and now with Paris’s eternal powers, Elga threatens to end the short-lived tranquility for the heroes.

As an old foe makes his return, Dragon Saga heroes gain a valuable ally as well. The Dragonkin race, with far more advanced culture and technology than the rest, comes out of their 1000 year long seclusion to lend our heroes a hand.

With new allies and enemies adding fuel to the never-ending struggle, will ‘Peace’ be a forever forgotten word in the world of Dragon Saga...?

Source: The Game Website.

113487.name: Dragon Saga - New Origins: Phase 2

videogameexpansion.113486: Dragon Saga: New Origins – Into the Darkness

113487.description:
New Origins updates are now complete. Dragonkin are complete and new Dungeons & Mission maps are ready to be explored. Now comes the fun part, the event after the update!

Each day of the event just for logging in you will receive a special Gasha box which contains:

1-10 Locked Thanksgiving Surprise Box
Box contains one of the following:
-Soul Box x20
-Soul Box x10
-Enchant Insurance Scroll x2
-Megaphone x10
-Reinforced Megaphone x7
-Safety Foam x5
-Gada Coin x5
-Soul x150
-Armor Enchant Powder x6
-Weapon Enchant Powder x3
-Rainbow Red Moneypack x1
-Rainbow Orange Moneypack x1
-Rainbow Yellow Moneypack x1
-Rainbow Purple Moneypack x1
-Rainbow Indigo Moneypack x1

1 Consumable Gasha Box
Box contains one of the following:
-Banana x5
-Grape x5
-Breadroll x5
-Slice of Cake x5
-Milk x5
-Lollipop x5
-Parfait x5
-Yogurt x5

Source: The Game Website.

113488.name: Waves
113488.description:
Shooter fans deserve more. And those who haven’t discovered the pleasure of twin stick destruction deserve an entry point. Introducing Waves, a twin stick shooter that can be played by anyone, but with a high enough skill threshold to keep even the most hardened shooter fan entertained.

Waves has been built from the ground up to be accessible, yet require mountains of skill to master. It cuts away the fluff and boils everything down to what’s really important: Highscores.
The goal is to clear the arena of enemies while racking up a big fat Combo with swift kills and well timed Bombs and if it all gets a bit too much you can use your Time Buffer to slow down the action and turn defeat into victory. Players can compete across five different game modes with online high-score tables and Achievements in their pursuit of perfection.

KEY FEATURES:

• Slow down time at will with the Time Buffer.
• Decimate enemies with well timed bombs.
• Chain together kills for massive combos.
• Battle against your friends scores with the online leaderboards.
• Keyboard/Mouse and Dual Analogue Controls
• Awesome soundtrack by the one and only SMILETRON.

GAME MODES:
• 3 minutes to get the highest score you can in Crunch Time – Perfect for boiling an egg.
• Level up and defeat the fearsome Cubes to extend your time in Rush.
• 3 Lives and more baddies than you can eat but watch out for ambushes in Survival.
• Bombing Run is all about the Boom. No guns but lots and lots of Boom. BOOM!
• Challenge puts your skills to the test with 20 levels and only 30 seconds each – Try and 5-Star them all.

Source: The Game Website.

113489.name: Other Side of the Mirror (Mar 2009)
113489.description: This page does not exist. You can edit this page to create it.

113490.name: Yahtzee Flash
113490.description:
"Thanks to innovative Wonder-Link technology, these super-smart dice know what you rolled, what you decide to hold, and automatically re-roll the rest. Rack up the scores in four addictive, fast-action games!

Your favorite game with a high-tech twist! Electronic YAHTZEE Flash will seem to read your mind as you play – drop the dice, line up the numbers you like, and YAHTZEE Flash re-rolls the others. Choose from four ways to play – Poker, Max, Wild or Flash. Wow your friends or play on your own – and the portable game case lets you play on the go.

Comes with 5 Electronic YAHTZEE “dice,” game case, Rules and Quick-Play Card."
- from Hasbro Site

113491.name: Other Side of the Mirror (May 2009)
113491.description: This page does not exist. You can edit this page to create it.

113492.name: Other Side of the Mirror (Jan 2010)
113492.description: This page does not exist. You can edit this page to create it.

113493.name: Other Side of the Mirror (Feb 2010)
113493.description: This page does not exist. You can edit this page to create it.

113494.name: Other Side of the Mirror (Mar 2010)
113494.description: This page does not exist. You can edit this page to create it.

113495.name: Other Side of the Mirror (May 2010)
113495.description: This page does not exist. You can edit this page to create it.

113496.name: Elemental Monster
113496.description:
User Summary

Elemental Monster is a battle game where the player makes use of cards to summon beasts. The player can create their own deck of cards, select three cards then place them on the battle field. They then select a monster to summon from one of these three cards. Each monster can be made to perform one of two attacks, or if you feel a slight imbalance against your opponent, can recall their creature and send out another in its place.

113497.name: Nesthäkchen
113497.description:
Objective: you are a mother animal - your very young child is hidden in the wood: go out, find your child (puppy/baby lamb/baby foal/baby calf) and be the first returning to your home
- moving by turn -
simple 'Roll & Move' game using a die with symbols
remark:
cute wooden figures

113498.name: Afterfall: Insanity
113498.description:
Afterfall: InSanity is a post-apocalyptic horror-genre game, which sets the stage for players to experience the Afterfall Universe. It is our first production on such a large scale, only a couple years ago it was merely an amateur project started as a response to the huge success of Fallout. However, after a change of the game engine, with a new crew and finally a new producer, Nicolas Games, we have managed to put together a great team and complete the work this time at the level and quality that we always knew it deserved. Afterfall: InSanity is the most important project in the careers of many of our team members.
The year is 2035. Almost 20 years ago the citizens of The Republic had to search for a shelter from the hell of the Third World War. Yet, only few were fortunate enough to have a place waiting for them in the prepared shelters. With the passage of time the fear of death on the surface has become only an unpleasant memory, however, the seemingly safe hideout has turned out to be a curse which cannot be escaped. It was only a matter of time before somebody would snap, and thus the dream of safety becomes a nightmare prison.

The protagonist of Afterfall: InSanity is a member of medical team which takes care of the mental and physical well-being of citizens living in the shelter. He specializes in the mental disorder caused by being locked-up for too long, yet he himself is not free of its symptoms. When all hell begins to break loose Albert has to find the answers to many questions, the where and the why, who is a real enemy and who a trusted friend. He will have to face the dangers lurking in the darkness of the shelter and in Albert’s own mind, battling with his own weaknesses and fears.

InSanity as a survival horror genre provides a healthy dose of fear and adrenaline to any lover of this particular game setting. Deep in the underground, trapped in the claustrophobic space with no hope for escape, the shadows hide secrets more dark and terrifying than the madness that takes over residents of the shelter.

Albert will have to square off against countless riddles, monsters and difficult to make decisions. He has been given a challenging task. He will have to show superb reflexes, the ability of logical thinking and deduction, not to mention nerves of steel.

Play the game, overcome your fears, save the residents of the shelter and try to find a new safe harbor…

Source: The Game Website.

113499.name: Planken Ud Knud!
113499.description:
User summary:

Party game for grown ups. Each player get one of Morten Ingemanns 20 cartoony characters, and the goal is to stay on the board. Players have to answer questions, sing songs, tell jokes, drink drinks or do other tasks, or suffer the consequenses.

113500.name: Grimm Tales
113500.description:
From the back of the book:

Set in a central Europe goodies with war, Grimm Tales throws the PCs into a nightmarish struggle between Jacob and Vilhelm Grimm! To save Europe from savage Ottoman Hordes, the characters journey to a small town in the Carpathian Mountains to retrieve a fabled magic mirror. But a desperate feud between two brothers shatters the characters' plans.

To capture the mirror, the characters must venture into a hellscape where childish fears come to life. It will take more than a trail of breadcrumbs to guide the characters to safety, but with the fate of Europe in their hands, they can't just sit in their tuffets doing nothing!
